question: In Gentlemen agreement Andhra was represented by:
explanation:
In Gentlemen agreement: Andhra was represented by
  1. Gopala Reddy- CM of Andhra state
  2. Sanjeev Reddy
  3. Latchanna
  4. Satya Narayana raju-President of APCC
Telangana was represented by
  1. Ramakrishna Rao-CM of Hyderabad state
  2. KV Ranga Reddi
  3. Chenna Reddi
  4. JV Narasinga Rao-President of Hyderabad congress committee
